articles.author: Debora MacKenzie
articles.title: Covid-19: Why won't the WHO officially declare a coronavirus pandemic?
articles.description: With outbreaks in multiple countries, the new coronavirus looks like a pandemic, but the World Health Organization won't declare one because governments may react in the wrong way
articles.content:
By Debora MacKenzie
Passengers arriving from Italy at Debrecen International Airport, Hungary, are being screened for signs of covid-19
Akos Stiller/Bloomberg via Getty Images
Prepare for a pandemic, says the World Health Organization, as the global spread… [+4613 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus is a pandemic in all but name as the infection goes global
articles.description: With outbreaks of covid-19 hitting Italy, Iran and South Korea, the World Health Organization's reluctance to label the spread of the virus a pandemic seems odd
articles.content:
Akos Stiller/Bloomberg via Getty Images
WILL the coronavirus outbreak become a pandemic? It is increasingly looking like it won’t but only in name. At a press briefing on 25 February, the head of the World Health Organization (WHO), Tedros Ghebreyesus, expre… [+323 chars]
